textContent:
The options for taking the meal are:
Homemade meals at locals - some of our neighbours offers traditional meals or local products (milk, cheese, honey, syrup). They are located at ~2min walking from us and the recommended donations are ~3€/pers/breakfast, ~6€/person/lunch or ~4€/pers/dinner. You will find a list with these locals in the room and (on arrival) you can call them, but it will be better to inform us when you make a booking and we will tell them to be prepared.
Each room has a kitchen - perfect for breakfast or dinner because here you can prepare or keep your food and you can also use the barbecue from the garden. Near the house, ~5min walking from us, are 3 grocery stores (

seeAlso.text: see here how to reach them)

Our recommendation is to eat at the locals who offers homemade meals.
Each room has a small kitchen with fridge, microwave owen, kettle, dishes, cutlery, tea and coffee.

textContent: Rosia Montana has a golden past. How the gold mining worked through galleries, watter mills, pounds and open pits, the past of the heritage buildings from the historic center or the impact of the mega mining project proposed here by the canadian company and the massive streets protests against it are just a few reasons why we recommend to visit Roșia Montana with a guide. The locality is not really designed for tourism so it will be pretty difficult to see and find all this by your own. We stay in touch with local guides who offers guided tours by foot or by bike (also technical assistance on the road). So, if you are interested in:

textContent: We have a small bike center with equipment and bikes for rent (mountain bikes, asphalt or trekking) at 15€ / bike / day. We can also offer tools and mechanical assistance for your bike. To find out more about the places you visit by bike or mechanical assistance on the trail, we can offer guided bike trails. Please specify when you make a booking if you want to rent bikes or guided bike trails.

textContent:
Library - we have many books that you can read but most of them are in romanian (don't miss the newspapers and the books about Roșia)
Hammocks with a view and wifi access - relax in our yard
Playground for children - beside our house
Movie projections about Rosia Montana past. The projector can be mounted in the garden or in the rooms.
Board games - In the library can be found many board games (Activity, Risk, Catan)
Sleighing - we have 2 sleighs that you can use during the winter on the sleigh slope beside the house
Badminton, tennis, football - we have paddles, balls and at ~15min walking is a synthetic field.

images.text: You can read books from our library (most of them were inherited from our grandparents).
We have a yard with gazebo, hammocks, wifi and sometimes we make movie projections for our guests.
We have equipment for badminton, tennis, football or sleighing. Beside the house is a playground, a slight slope and at ~15min is a synthetic field.

textContent: We are located in the historic center of Rosia Montana in a heritage house, recently restored. We offer rooms for 2, 3 or 4 persons, each has private entrance, kitchen and private bathroom, and a small yard with gazebo, hammocks, green grass and a nice view to Cârnic massif.
